Folder

File

Description

.vscode/

launch.json

VSCode Debug file

arduino_probe/

arduino_probe.ino

Arduino code to interface with the Teslameter

docs/

Generated documentation

data/

User generated data

path/

User generated path

./

.gitignore

Used to ignore some folders when commiting to GitHub

./

config_default.json

JSON file with default settings for every shape

./

config.json

JSON file for user to store configuration

./

main.py

Main python script to start the mapper controller software

./

mapper_base.py

Contains the Mapper class

./

mapper_config_setter.py

Contains the Config_Setter class

./

mapper_datalogger.py

Contains the Datalogger class

./

Contains the Points_Generator class
